complaint.description: Vodacom is a terrible service provider. Have been trying for a month to cancel a contract, their call centre agents all leave you on dial tone for 5 minutes and hang up. Their bot promises to send a cancellation email, but never does. They list the wrong number for cancellations (does not exist). They don't get back to you, and instead spam you with marketing. I'll never do business with them again.
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer service by training call center agents to provide better assistance and ensure that the cancellation process is smooth and efficient. Update the contact information provided to customers for cancellations. Stop spamming customers with marketing materials.
